title: 默认参数
desc:
### 题目描述
请修改test函数，使得代码框中两条test函数调用语句成功运行


### 输入描述
参数age默认指定值


### 输出描述
输出为test函数打印的内容


### 测试样例

#### 样例1: 输入-输出

```
10
```

```
My name is Alice and my age is 18
My name is Mike and my age is 10
```
templateCode:
num=int(input())
def test(name,age):
    print('My name is %s and my age is %d'%(name,age))
test('Alice',18)
test('Mike')
sourceCode:
num=int(input())
def test(name,age=num):
    print('My name is %s and my age is %d'%(name,age))
test('Alice',18)
test('Mike')

testCases.output:
My name is Alice and my age is 18
My name is Mike and my age is 10
